query:
SELECT t.id, t.name, t.projectId, COUNT(tc.id) as checklist_count
FROM tasks t
LEFT JOIN taskChecklists tc ON t.id = tc.taskId
WHERE t.id = 1
GROUP BY t.id, t.name, t.projectId;
